placeDesc: It usually takes a special occasion to stand in the company of a President of the United States, let alone several. Rapid City makes it a bit easier.Over the course of several blocks in downtown Rapid City, visitors will find a life-sized bronze statue of every President in the history of the United States. A bit eccentric in number, there is no denying the respect and care with which the city has erected these statues.
placeShortDesc: Every president in history is immortalized in bronze in downtown Rapid City.
placeNearby: Firehouse Brewing Co.,Art Alley,Hotel Alex Johnson
placeAddress: 631 Main St.,Rapid City, South Dakota, 57701,United States
placeRelatedPlaces: Statue of Abraham Lincoln at Lytle Park,Yonekoyaki Craft Center Shisa Park,Hahn/Cock,Wat Tham Ta Pan
